name: Lucky Egg
description:
A game about finding a key in a toy egg to unlock a wonderful prize!

This is for the 7-day Newgrounds July Game Jam. The theme is "egg".

CONTROLS:

Z: For actions

HOLD Z: To speed up

BUGS:

*May have some minor graphical hiccups. Holding down Z from the start may cause some.

*The machine will flicker the first and/or the second time you use it, but should stop after that
